name: Kitball 20000
description:
Welcome to Kitball 20000!



Kitball is a homage to classic old-school Maze Shooters of the 90's era, featuring modernized gameplay and graphics, while still holding onto the original simplicity and charm of its inspiration.



Kitball 20000 features:
- 4 Player Couch Split Screen action! (Screen-Peeking encouraged)
- Single Player mode with new enemy types in every level!
- Randomly generated mazes for a unique experience every time!
- Powerups to destroy your friends with!
- Breakable terrain to create your own path to victory!
- Voiced cutscenes!
- A cat!



Best played with a Gamepad! Navigate through randomly generated mazes, break through walls, and boost your way around corners to secure your victory in a free-for-all battle with your friends! One shot, you die. Be the last one standing and abuse the power of screen-peeking to your heart's content. Speed through the map using your boost power, break through walls using your shots, or simply take it tactical and utilize the windows and one-way pathways to your advantage; You play your way.
